subject: Order shipment
description_text:
Hello,
Can you tell me when Order #SSN2666 will be delivered at my home?
Thank you in advance.

Greets,

Erik van Empelen

conversations.body_text: Hi Erik van Empelen,     We sincerely apologise for the delay caused. We have noted that the logistics of your parcel appear to have stalled, and we shall immediately investigate the cause. https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326624655DE&cid=c_dhl_2502061_2353

Hello,

Thank you for your response.
I had noticed the same issue when i opened the dhl.de site.
I hope you can help me get it delivered at my home.

Greetz,

Erik van Empelen

Op 24 sep 2025 om 10:12 heeft service@simsonn.com het volgende geschreven:

ï»¿
Hi Erik van Empelen,

We sincerely apologise for the delay caused. We have noted that the logistics of your parcel appear to have stalled, and we shall immediately investigate the cause.
https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326624655DE&cid=c_dhl_2502061_2353
Alright, we have contacted DHL to inquire and expedite the matter.
